content: Hey all! :wave: I was still looking to help maintain the log crate, but don't currently have permissions to it. Do we have a GitHub team that has push and publish rights to rust-lang libs but doesn't receive libs pings (which I still can't keep up with yet)? Maybe library-reviewers?

Hey! I think that's likely because you stepped back from the libs team -- it looks like only that team has the write permissions currently. Happy to help get permissions resolved, but I'd prefer to not grant directly to individuals -- we should consider either a log-reviewers subteam or similar, I suspect.
Thanks @simulacrum :pray: It sounds like log-reviewers might line up well with the active maintenance RFC?
Yes, I intend to mention this to Manish and see if we want to integrate there
